summary: For forty years, Esfandiar has been unconcernedly preparing corpses for the journey to their final resting place. One day, whilst preparing a burial service, he's taken ill. Might he too be mortal ?
cast: Yadollah Anvari|Abbas Esfandiari|Delbar Ghasri|Mohsen Rahimi|Safar-Ali Safari
title: Khab-e talkh
